#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation
= URL format standard =

|| *Router address* || ||
|| */* || index page of CDOJ ||
|| */index/* || index page of CDOJ ||
|| */problemset/page/* || problem list, page 1 ||
|| */problemset/page/{page}* || problem list, {page} defined the page to show ||
|| */problemset/problem/{id}* || show problem{id} ||
